glsa.title: Spreadsheet-ParseExcel: Arbitrary Code Execution
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability has been discovered in Spreadsheet-ParseExcel, which can lead to arbitrary code execution.

background.p: Spreadsheet::ParseExcel is a perl module to extract information from Excel files.

description.p: A vulnerability has been discovered in Spreadsheet::ParseExcel. Please review the CVE identifier referenced below for details.

impact.p: Please review the referenced CVE identifier for details.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Spreadsheet::ParseExcel users should upgrade to the latest version:
